text: The Linwood Plantation is a plantation with a historic house in Tensas Parish, Louisiana, United States. The manager's house was built in 1875. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since September 23, 1994. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Louisiana Category:Greek Revival architecture in Louisiana Category:Houses completed in 1875 Category:Buildings and structures in Tensas Parish, Louisiana Category:Plantations in Louisiana
title: Linwood Plantation
